title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus. Before the Photon update, clicking on the Combo would correctly give it focus, but now it doesn't. The Combo only takes focus when I drop down the combo list.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus. It only takes focus when I drop down the combo list.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Observe that the Combo does not take focus.
5. Drop down the combo list and observe that the Combo takes focus.
